thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com
thread.title: Jillian

author: Jillian
title: Jillian
text:
I am cruising to the States from Australia in May and needed to book a flight back
We dock in Seattle and as it is so close to Canada we thought why not come home from Vancouver.
I have googled flights over the past 2 months and they were quite expensive.
Then by chance I found Flighthub. I subscribed for their emails on cheap flights for my return home.
They emailed me regularly and I was able to click on the link and go straight to the flights.
I easily filled in all the details ,chose seats and specified meals. I could have even taken insurance to cover any cancellation or changes. I payed with my credit card. It took a couple of times to accept my card but when it was booked I was able to print everthing.
They backed it up with an email and as I joined the page I can go back in and find it on there as well.
Overall it was a very smooth Ã nd stress free experience and I got a good price and the quickest direct route possible.
